text: Coronavirus in Illinois updates: 980 new known COVID-19 cases reported — the highest daily total in more than a month — as Gov. J.B. Pritzker calls for national mask mandate
The retail bankruptcies and store closings just keep coming. For some merchants, the pandemic was ‘the straw that broke the camel’s back.’
Lightfoot ignores Trump’s demands to reopen schools fully in fall: We don’t know ‘what September is going to look like’
NorthShore to acquire one of the Chicago area’s few remaining independent hospitals
Which parts of the Chicago area got the most PPP loans? Check out this ZIP code analysis.

Best movies of 2020 so far, according to the audience
Kanye’s Gap wall on Michigan Avenue is a block-long message to the City of Chicago. Is his ambition as big as America?

Column: The Blackhawks are keeping their nickname. But the decision walks a fine line between respect and disrespect.

Column: Trump demands schools reopen or funds might be cut — our (expendable) kids must face the virus!
